title: Sami Tamyalew, MBA 22: “Service is at the core of my being”
author: Natasha Payés
excerpt:
Samrawit (Sami) Tamyalew, MBA 22, joined the 101st Airborne Division (Air Assault) in 2014, becoming the first female artillery platoon leader in the division. At Fort Campbell, she led artillerymen across an array of different specialties. Haas News spoke to Tamyalew about why she joined the U.S. Army, what it was like serving in a […]
The post Sami Tamyalew, MBA 22: “Service is at the core of my being” appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
